archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Microsoft Excel
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: Microsoft Excel is an application component categorized as a software application. It functions primarily as a spreadsheet program, enabling users to store, organize, and manipulate data through a grid of cells. Excel offers features like formulas, pivot tables, and various data visualization tools, making it widely used for data analysis, financial modeling, and reporting. As an application component, it integrates with other software systems and supports business processes by facilitating data management and decision-making activities. Excel is part of the Microsoft Office suite and is interoperable with other Microsoft applications.
